606
Air 20.02.2024 at 14.30 (video)
Russia and India have for many centuries been linking not only business contacts but also sincere interest in the culture, art and philosophy of our peoples. Guerzen's library was a creative Russian-Indian evening called Friendship. Hindi's "friend" means "friend."

511
19.02.2024 at 14.30 (video)

Premier on the stage of the Kirov drama, the comedy show, Don't Trust Men

Culture
19 February 2024 15:15
511
Ether 16.02.2024 at 21.05 (video)
First Premier this year on the stage of Drumteatra. The Kyrian artists and the Moscow director are ready to welcome the viewers to the comedy play. Our survey team went to the final rehearsal.

In Kirov, an exhibition on a cosmonaut pilot, the Gorhoe of the USSR Alexander Serebrov, opened

Culture
19 February 2024 14:45
518
Ether 19.02.2024 at 09.00 (video)
The Children ' s Space Center has opened an exhibition of the Four Lifes of Alexander Serebrov, devoted to the 80th anniversary of the outstanding cosmonaut, the hero of the Soviet Union, the honorary citizen of Kirova. Details of his life on Vitka, as well as the exhibition exhibits, Albina Samigullin.

Kirov has an exhibition on the city ' s sports history.

18 February 2024 16:11
569
Every exhibition visitor can feel himself as a winner of the competition.
